page.title: 11LIFE-STYLES PLEAN/COWIE
page.content: The most common mode of dress in the area is jeans, T shirt and trainers (shoes). Many of the children wear a uniform to school but this is not compulsory. Teenagers spend a lot of time listening to pop groups on their transistor radios that they carry around with them. Discos are very popular and it is the fashion to hire a disco to celebrate special occasions. Bingo is still enjoyed mainly by women. Many families spend money on horse racing, greyhound racing and the football pools.
